The provided Node.js code is a module file that exports the default export from another module located in the same directory named `index`. It is leveraging the CommonJS module system, which is the standard module system for Node.js.

Here's a possible rewrite of this Node.js code:

```javascript
"use strict";

// Import the default export from the 'index' module.
const indexDefaultExport = require('./index').default;

// Export this default export so it can be used in the modules that require this file.
module.exports = indexDefaultExport;
```
